Package hjb.http

Contains the HJBServlet class and support classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
HJBServlet HJBServlet accepts requests and translates them into JMSCommands that manipulate HJB's configured JMS resources.
HJBServletConstants HJBServletConstants contains constants used during processing of HttpServletRequests by the HJBServlet.
RuntimeExceptionHandler RuntimeExceptionHandler is used to handle any runtime exceptions that occur during the processing of a request by the HJBServlet
 

Package hjb.http Description

Contains the HJBServlet class and support classes.

HJBServlet is the entry point for all HJB requests. It dispatches requests made on URLs that HJB recognises, causing the invocation of JMS API methods on the JMS objects in the HJB runtime.

HJBServletConstants defines constants used in HJBServlet and its helper classes.

RuntimeExceptionHandler handles any exceptions that may occur while HJBServlet is processing requests.
